report.title: NBN Exchange format
report.description: An extract of records in a format suitable for creating NBN Exchange format files in combination with the nbn output format.
report.query: select #columns# from cache_occurrences co join occurrences o on o.id=co.id join samples s on s.id=o.sample_id #agreements_join# #joins# where #sharing_filter# and co.date_type in ('D','DD','O','OO','Y','YY','-Y','U') and lower(s.entered_sref_system) in ('osgb', 'osni', '4326', '27700') and (cast(co.survey_id as character varying)='#survey_id#' or '#survey_id#'='') and (trim('#date_from#')='' or '#date_from#'='Click here' or co.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) and (trim('#date_to#')='' or '#date_to#'='Click here' or co.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) and ( (o.record_status='V') or ('#quality#'='C' and co.certainty='C') or ('#quality#'='L' and co.certainty in ('C', 'L')) or ('#quality#'='!D' and co.record_status<>'D') or ('#quality#'='!R') ) and co.taxa_taxon_list_external_key is not null

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys

param.name: date_from
param.description: Filter by record added or updated date

param.name: date_to
param.description: Filter by record added or updated date

param.name: taxon_group_id
param.description: Select the taxon group to return data for, or leave for all groups
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM taxon_groups

param.name: quality
param.description: Quality level required of data to be included in the map.
param.lookup_values: V:Data must be verified,C:Data must be verified or certain,L:Data must be at least likely,!D:Include anything not dubious or rejected,!R:Include anything not rejected

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include

column.name: gridreference
column.sql: case s.entered_sref_system when '4326' then null else replace(s.entered_sref, ' ', '') end

column.name: projection
column.sql: case s.entered_sref_system when '4326' then 'WGS84' when '27700' then 'OSGB36' else upper(s.entered_sref_system) end

column.name: precision
column.sql: case s.entered_sref_system when '4326' then 50 when '27700' then 1 else pow(10, (12-length(s.entered_sref))/2) end
